creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: brown cotton with very long and wide "straps"; PR strap ends with pocket; center part in two sections completely embroidered; larger top rectangle features large overlapping flower shape, outlined in white raised tape, with smaller pink flowers satin stitched throughout on blue, red, green and brown silk; smaller lower rectangle has flowers embroidered on brown silk; small white square attached to bottom with brown piping which borders entire piece
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic strips, sequins; needlework
title: Baby Carrier
